1.1.2
=====
Updated notification format.

1.1.1
=====
Added high-level SDPDevice class, which stores the state of a device.
The long polling code has been rewritten. See the WebZapper and Stopwatch apps for examples, and see the step-by-step guide.

1.1
===
Added support for API v1.1.

1.0
===
Initial release.
